description:
(i) No abstraction shall take place when the <<chemical>> ion concentration in the water as indicated by the results of the sampling is greater than or equal to <<WQ quantity and units>>. 

(ii) Abstraction shall not recommence until <<two consecutive>> conductivity readings from the <<borehole etc>> show a conductivity of less than <<chemical ion concentration>>. The first reading shall be taken at least <<duration>> after abstraction has ceased and the second reading shall be taken at least <<duration>> thereafter.
